title: Financial Assistance from the Asian Development Bank (ADB) for the 	implementation of National Highway Sector Project (Additional 	Financing)
decision_details:
-  the Asian Development Bank is to provide US$ 85 million 	(approximately Rs.10 billion) for the rehabilitation of 62 km. of National 	Highways Road Sections. The Government contribution to the investment 	would be US$ 20.60 million the following link roads to the Southern Express 	way are to be developed under this project: 

		*	Matara-Akuressa Road - 			3.40 Km. 
		*	Hikkaduwa-Baddegama Road -	          14.34 Km. 
		*	Horana-Anguluwatota-Aluthgama Road -  3.48 Km. 
		*	Katukurunda-Neboda Road -		  2.72 Km. 
		*	Kirulapone-Godagama Road - 		  5.33 Km.  
		*	Colombo-Horana Road -			12.70 Km.
